data.title: Spirit of Halloweentown in St. Helens, OR
data.meta_description: Discover the magic of Spirit of Halloweentown! Learn why thousands of visitors return each year to immerse themselves in this Halloween wonderland. Whether you're a fan of the iconic 'Halloweentown' movie, love spooky celebrations, or are looking for unfo
data.text:
Step into the Enchanting World of Spirit of Halloweentown 2024!

From September 28 to October 31, the entire city of St. Helens, Oregon, transforms into a Halloween wonderland! Immerse yourself in a month-long celebration filled with:

Themed Weekends: Enjoy special events every weekend, from Twilight Weekend to the 26th Anniversary of Disney's "Halloweentown."

Celebrity Appearances: Meet your favorite stars and create unforgettable memories.

Pumpkin Lighting & Photo-ops: Witness the magical lighting of the Great Pumpkin and capture the moment with a variety of themed photo-ops.

Family-Friendly Attractions: Explore haunted tours, interactive exhibits, and so much more that the entire family will love.
